description.value: Exceptional Leader: The Rogue Trader is a natural leader whose commands inspire confidence and determination in their followers. Through force of personality and tactical acumen, they can rally their allies in the most dire circumstances.

system.benefit: As a Free Action once per round, you may grant one ally within line of sight and hearing a +10 bonus to any one Test. You cannot use this ability on yourself.
system.notes: Free Action: Grant one visible ally +10 to any Test (cannot self-target)

specialAbilities.name: Inspiring Leadership
specialAbilities.description: Once per round as a Free Action, grant one ally you can see and who can hear you +10 to any one Test. Cannot be used on yourself.
